content: ✨ english pattern written in english in uk/us standard terms note this is a listing for a crochet pattern and is delivered via digital instant download pattern downloadable crochet pattern - chevron moss stitch advent scarf description this is a pattern for the chevron moss stitch advent scarf written pattern perfect to use your advent minis size finished scarf approximately 148cm x 18cm instructions to make wider and also can make to any lkength you want skill level beginner materials you will need hook - 5mm yarn - any dk weight yarn scissors tapestry/wool needle visit me instagram - https //www instagram com/emkatcrochet/ facebook - https //www facebook com/emkatcrochetx thank you for visiting my shop if you have any questions while crocheting your chevron moss stitch advent scarf please feel free to contact me with love helen♥
